paragraphs.zh-tw: 大家好我們要展示何謂創作我會重現蘭恩的一件摺紙作品
paragraphs.en: Hello everyone. And so the two of us are here to give you an example of creation. And I'm going to be folding one of Robert Lang's models.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 就用這張紙所有的褶痕都在上面了在我摺的同時 魯法斯會即興創作用他的招牌 五弦電子大提琴表演絕對讓各位耳目一新
paragraphs.en: And this is the piece of paper it will be made from, and you can see all of the folds that are needed for it. And Rufus is going to be doing some improvisation on his custom, five-string electric cello, and it's very exciting to listen to him.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 準備好了嗎？要開始了！這只是要讓過程更有趣
paragraphs.en: Are you ready to go? OK. Just to make it a little bit more exciting.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 好了 你把它拿走吧(音樂)好了，開始囉(鼓掌)
paragraphs.en: All right. Take it away, Rufus. (Music) All right. There you go.

title: Bruno Bowden Folds While Rufus Cappadocia Plays
